scripts.build: CI=false && node scripts/clean-index.js && node scripts/clean-ant-icons.cjs && node scripts/fix-ant-icons.js && node scripts/fix-ant-icons-jsx.js && node -r ./crypto-polyfill.cjs ./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js build && node scripts/ensure-react-deps.js && node scripts/patch-ant-icons.js && node scripts/patch-ant-icons-inline.js && node scripts/check-ant-icons-files.js && node scripts/ensure-ant-icons.js && node scripts/render-post-build.js
scripts.render-build: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=3072 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false CI=false node -r ./crypto-polyfill.cjs ./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js build --mode production
scripts.simplified-build: node postinstall.js && node -r ./crypto-polyfill.cjs ./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js build --mode production && node scripts/ensure-ant-icons.js
scripts.prepare: node -e "try { if (!process.env.CI && !process.env.RENDER) { require('child_process').execSync('cd .. && husky install frontend/.husky', {stdio: 'inherit'}) } } catch (e) { console.log('Husky install failed, but this is ok in production environments'); }"
